summary: A mysterious hunchback abducts a bride on the day of her wedding, holding her hostage as he goes on a revenge spree.
cast: Vikram|Amy Jackson|Suresh Gopi|Upen Patel|Santhanam|Ramkumar Ganesan|Powerstar Srinivasan|Mohan Kapur|Ojas Rajani|Syed Siddiq|Sajid Bubere|Kamaraj|Alfred Hsing|Sarath Kumar|Shelley Marshall|Yogi Babu|Mahru Sheikh
title: I
